text: Overall Impression is Luckin Coffee at Eastpoint Mall offers a convenient and relatively affordable option for coffee lovers. Their focus on technology for ordering and payment aims for efficiency. With a wide range of coffee and other beverages, including some unique and popular choices.
My favourite coffee haunt. Tried the brown sugar plum latte today. Didn’t like it. Still prefer the coconut latte

Around 12pm on May 4,2025,
The Coffee is really good but the service from the crew is really bad, would appreciate for this service industry to gives more training or brief these people. this will affect the rates and sell.

Use Mobile App to order with discount. For those insisting of using the Kiosk ordering machine, it’s not operational for this particular outlet yet, hopefully it will be fix and running in the coming weeks. Limited seats available
